errors.error_description: The README provides an incorrect package name for installation. It suggests `pip install quacc-core`, but the correct package on PyPI is `quacc`.
correction_candidates: The correct command is `pip install quacc`.
The correct command is `conda install -c conda-forge quacc`.
The package should be installed from source: `git clone https://github.com/Quantum-Accelerators/quacc.git; cd quacc; pip install .`
The correct command is `pip install quantum-accelerator`.
errors.golden_answer: The correct command is `pip install quacc`.
